mapper.select: select id,name from shop_category where parent_id = #{parentId}
select * from shop_goods where status = 1 and is_delete = 1 order By subscribe_num desc limit 4
select * from shop_goods where category_id = #{categoryId} and status = 1 and is_delete = 1 order By subscribe_num

select sg.id,sg.recommend,sg.title,sg.selling_price,sg.marking_price,sc.name as category_name, sg.subscribe_num,sg.detail,sg.arrival_time,ss.id as supplier_id,ss.name as supplier_name,ss.tel as supplier_tel, ss.address as supplier_address from shop_goods as sg,shop_supplier as ss,shop_category as sc where sg.category_id = sc.id and sg.supplier_id = ss.id and sg.id = #{goodsId} and sg.status = 1 and sg.is_delete = 1
select count(*) from shop_goods_appointment where goods_id = #{goodsId} and create_id = #{UserId}
select * from shop_goods where supplier_id = #{supplierId} and status = 1 and is_delete = 1 order By subscribe_num limit 4
mapper.insert: insert into shop_goods_appointment( goods_id, status, user_name, user_tel, num, create_id, create_date )values ( #{goodsId}, #{status}, #{userName}, #{userTel}, #{num}, #{createId}, #{createDate} )
mapper.select: select * from shop_goods where title like concat('%',#{searchName},'%')
mapper.update: update shop_goods set subscribe_num = subscribe_num + #{appointmentNum} where id = #{goodsId} and subscribe_num + #{appointmentNum} <= stock
